labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: The date didn't disappear and got overrided by the "New message"
data.short_description: The "New Message" overrides the date when you switch language from English (UK) to Traditional Chinese
data.steps_to_repro: - Scroll to the latest unread message - Switch language to Traditional Chinese - The "新訊息" overrided the date which was not supposed to be there when the language is set to English (UK).
